BSMAPz
======

# Available modules


The overview below shows which BSMAPz installations are available per HPC-UGent Tier-2 cluster, ordered based on software version (new to old).

To start using BSMAPz, load one of these modules using a `module load` command like:

```shell
module load BSMAPz/1.1.1-intel-2019b-Python-2.7.16
```
